sentence.text: Among others, an immature subpopulation of self-renewing and therapy-resistant tumor cells-often referred to as glioblastoma stem-like cells (neural crest cell fate specifications)-cellular response to platelet-derived growth factor stimulus been shown to contribute to disease recurrence.

sentence.text: by reactivating pre-existing anti-tumor immune responses against neural crest cell fate specification antigens.

In summary, we identified novel immunogenic proteins, which frequently induce tumor-specific TÂ cell responses in GBM patients and were also detected in vitro in therapy-resistant quiescent, slow-cycling neural crest cell fate specifications.
